9 std::string win_name;
10 void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
11 {
12  try
13  {
14  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
15  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg,"");
16 
17  ROS_INFO("resolution: %dx%d\n",cv_ptr->image.cols,cv_ptr->image.rows);
18  cv::imshow("view",cv_ptr->image); //eventually window title based in topic
19  cv::waitKey(30);
20  }
21  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
22  {
23  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n",e.what());
24  }
25  return;
26 }
27 void motorImageCallback(const remote_robotics::MotorImg& msg)
28 {
29  int idx;
30  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
31 
32  idx = msg.INDEX;
33  //ROS_INFO("%i\n",idx); //debugging
34 
35  try
36  {
37  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg.IMG,"");
38  //char idx_str[3];
39  //itoa(msg.INDEX,idx_str,10);
40  win_name = "motor" + std::to_string(msg.INDEX);//(const char*)idx_str;
41 
42  ROS_INFO("resolution: %dx%d\n",cv_ptr->image.cols,cv_ptr->image.rows);
43  cv::imshow(win_name,cv_ptr->image);
44  cv::waitKey(30);
45  }
46  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
47  {
48  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n",e.what());
49  return;
50  }
51 
52 }

56 int main(int argc, char** argv)
57 {
58  ros::init(argc, argv,"image_viewer");
59  ros::NodeHandle nh;
60  cv::namedWindow("view",cv::WINDOW_AUTOSIZE/* | cv::WINDOW_KEEPRATIO | cv::WINDOW_GUI_EXPANDED*/);
61 
62  if(argc < 3)
63  {
64  ROS_INFO("usage: process <msg type (ImageTransport or MotorImg)> <subscriber_topic const char*>\n");
65  return 1;
66  }
67 
68 
69  if ((std::string(argv[1]).compare(0,8,"MotorImg") == 0))
70  {
71  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe(argv[2],5,motorImageCallback);
72  }
73  else // image transport msgs are default option
74  {
75  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
76  win_name="view";
77  image_transport::Subscriber sub = it.subscribe(argv[2],5,imageCallback);
78  }
79 
80 
81  ros::spin();
82  cv::destroyWindow(win_name);
83 
84  std::cout << "terminating node..." << std::endl;
85  return 0;
86 }
